gesture_rotate_angle.htm+html.head.title: gesture_rotate_angle.htm+html.body.p:90-3
gesture_rotate_angle: This function is used to set the angle which a pair of touches must exceed in order to trigger a Rotate Start Gesture. The angle is measured in degrees and has a default value of 5°.

gesture_rotate_angle.htm+html.head.title: gesture_rotate_angle.htm+html.body.p:104-3
gesture_rotate_angle: The above code checks to see if rotation angle for gestures is set to 5° and if it is not it sets it to that value.
